node.name: Antepedia Developer For Eclipse
node.shortdescription:
Release Note: Version 1.2.2 uses a deprecated Antepedia API. Please upgrade to 1.9+, or try Antepedia Reporter 2.0

Thanks to Antepedia Developer for Eclipse:
> Stay aware of Updates & Security Issues
> Enforce Open Source Licensing Policies
> Customize and Manage Software Bill of Materials

Antepedia Developer for Eclipse retrieves information about Licenses, Updates, and security vulnerabilities, while connecting to Antepedia's Open Source knowledge base. It can be enhanced with Antepedia Reporter 2.0 Free Edition.

Our first goal is to save of our customers time by:
> considering that time consuming tasks should never have to be done twice.
> providing a scalable scanning algorithm above Antepedia.
> supporting de facto standard tools and formats like Apache Maven, SPDX ,...
> building advanced GUI to ease information management.

Antepedia's Open Source knowledge base is home of the largest knowledge base of open source projects with more than 2,000,000 projects, downloaded from Maven Central Repository, GoogleCode, SourceForge, Maven Central Repository, RubyForge, OW2, etc.

Antepedia Developer for Eclipse is free, and can be connected to Antepedia Reporter 2.0 Free Edition

Antepedia Reporter 2.0 delivers an intelligent system for managing software bill of materials (BoM) by providing detailed information within the Antepedia Reporter Private Knowledge Base (custom fields definition, report generation, pre-filled BoM generation, ...).

Antepedia Reporter enables the continuous management of open source throughout the software development lifecycle.
node.body:

Thanks to Antepedia Developer for Eclipse:

> Enforce Open Source Licensing Policies

Antepedia Developer for Eclipse retrieves information about Licenses, Updates, and security vulnerabilities, while connecting to Antepedia's Open Source knowledge base. It can be enhanced with Antepedia Reporter 2.0 Free Edition.
